kernel

Interface CommandFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommandFilter, BuriedAgentsCommandFilter, ChainedCommandFilter, DeadAgentsCommandFilter, FrozenAgentsCommandFilter, SingleCommandFilter, WrongTimeCommandFilter

    public interface CommandFilter
    An interface for allowing the kernel to filter out agent commands.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void filter(java.util.Collection<Command> commands, KernelState state)
      Filter a set of agent commands.
      void initialise(Config config)
      Initialise this filter.

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        void initialise(Config config)
        Initialise this filter.
        Parameters:
        config - The kernel configuration.

      • filter

        void filter(java.util.Collection<Command> commands,
          KernelState state)
        Filter a set of agent commands. Any illegal commands should be removed from the given collection.
        Parameters:
        commands - The commands to filter. This collection should be modified to remove any illegal commands.
        state - The state of the kernel.
